arabic.title: El Leilah
text: الليلة الليلة لا حنغفل ولا حننام
الليلة الليلة لا حنغفل ولا حننام
الليلة الليلة لا حنغفل ولا حننام
الليلة الليلة لا حنغفل ولا حننام

english.title: El Leilah
text: Tonight tonight is a night of love and happiness
Tonight tonight we are not going to close our eyes or fall a sleep
And whoever cause sadness to himself deserve it
Let me live and live it man
Spoil your nights and go with it you silly guy
And if it feels like dancing go ahead
Spoil it so you can see better sweet nights
Live your time love your life
Turn the page of your sadness
Don’t give up so you would not lose it (he means your mind)
And buy the love of whoever loves you
And whoever gives you up give them up

arabic.title: انا بعشقه
text: انا بعشقة للدنيا ايوة هقولها انا
دة فرحة الدنيا وما فيها جاتلى فية
وبدعى ربنا كل يوم يخلينى لية
انا بعشقة بكون ضعيفة بشوفة انا بستقوى
دة حد من نوع اللى مرة بتلاقية
انا حبة نفسى تقول ما هية ملك لية
ملكنى بكل احساسى فاكرنى تملى مش ناسى
بقالى هو دة ناسى مليش بعدية
بتبدا كل احلامى وتحضن صورتة ايامى
انا بعشقة معرفش لما بقابلة يومها انا
دة اللى زيو نفسى اعرف راحو فين
ملكنى بكل احساسى فاكرنى تملى مش ناسى
بقالى هو دة ناسى مليش بعدية
بتبدا كل احلامى وتحضن صورتة ايامى

english.title: I love him
text: I love him, to the world yes I will say it
Happiness of the world and all it has come to me in him
and I plead to God every day to keep him for me
I love him, I would be weak, I say him and I become stronger by him
He is a kind of a person you only find once
I love my self as long as it is his
He owned me in all my senses, he always remembers me and does not forget
He is the left for me, he is my people, after him I have no one
when he comes in front of me
All my dreams start and his image embraces my days
I love him, I do not know at the time I meet him
He takes me out of my soul and life with two words only
I would like to know where people like him are
He owned me in all my senses, he always remembers me and does not forget
He is the left for me, he is my people, after him I have no one
when he comes in front of me
All my dreams start and his image embraces my days
